title: Schedule Banho & Tosa appointment successfully
description: Verify that a customer can schedule a Banho & Tosa appointment within operational hours with valid pet details and optional extra services.

steps.description: Open the scheduling page
Select service type Banho & Tosa
Choose a date and time within operational hours (e.g., 10:00 AM)
Input pet details with valid weight within allowed range
Select optional extra services
Submit the appointment
Verify appointment is confirmed and stored
Verify pricing matches pet weight and selected extra services

title: Prevent scheduling more than two appointments per time slot
description: Ensure the system enforces a maximum of two simultaneous appointments for the same time slot.

steps.description: Schedule two appointments for the same date and time slot
Attempt to schedule a third appointment for the same date and time slot
Verify that the third scheduling attempt is blocked with an appropriate error message

title: Validate scheduling outside operational hours is rejected
description: Check the scheduling system prevents booking appointments outside the allowed operational hours of 9am-11am and 1pm-5pm.

steps.description: Navigate to scheduling page
Select a time before 9am (e.g., 8:00 AM) and attempt to schedule
Verify error message prohibits scheduling outside operational hours
Select a time after 5pm (e.g., 6:00 PM) and attempt to schedule
Verify error message prohibits scheduling outside operational hours

title: Enforce pet weight constraints on scheduling
description: Verify the system validates pet weight according to service requirements and rejects invalid entries.

steps.description: Select Banho & Tosa service
Enter pet weight below minimum allowed limit
Attempt to schedule the appointment
Display validation error preventing scheduling
Enter pet weight above maximum allowed limit
Attempt to schedule the appointment
Display validation error preventing scheduling

title: Schedule recurring monthly client subscription correctly
description: Verify monthly clients can subscribe with recurrence types, and the system generates future appointments and tracks payments automatically.

steps.description: Log in as customer
Select subscription service with recurrence options
Provide required subscription data including pet details and recurrence frequency
Submit subscription
Verify immediate appointment is scheduled and saved
Verify future appointments are auto-generated according to recurrence
Verify payment tracking records are created correctly

title: Verify mobile pet service scheduling includes address validations
description: Ensure scheduling Pet Móvel service requires condominium address input and validates address format correctly.

steps.description: Select Pet Móvel service type
Attempt to schedule without providing condominium address
Display validation error requiring condominium address
Provide invalid condominium address format
Display error for invalid address format
Provide valid condominium address and schedule appointment
Confirm appointment is successfully scheduled with correct address

title: Enroll and manage pet daycare service with behavior and owner info
description: Test enrolling pets in daycare capturing comprehensive pet behavior and owner information and confirm data persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to daycare service enrollment
Fill pet information including behavior fields
Input owner personal and contact details
Submit daycare enrollment
Verify enrollment confirmation and stored data accuracy

title: Perform check-in and check-out for pet hotel service with digital authorizations
description: Validate hotel pet service workflows including check-in/out, adding optional services, and capturing digital signatures for authorizations.

steps.description: Access pet hotel service panel as administrator
Create new hotel booking with pet and owner data
Perform check-in process capturing digital authorization
Confirm check-in status updated and authorization saved
Add additional hotel services (e.g., grooming)
Complete check-out with final charges and digital signature
Verify check-out finalizes booking and stores all relevant data

title: Authenticate users with Supabase and role-based access control
description: Verify login functionality using Supabase authentication and enforce session management with access control by user roles (customer, admin, staff).

steps.description: Attempt login with valid customer credentials
Login succeeds and customer session is created
Attempt login with valid administrator credentials
Login succeeds and administrative panels are accessible
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Login is rejected with appropriate error message
Verify restricted pages redirect unauthorized users

title: Verify Brazilian format validation for date, phone, and currency inputs
description: Check that all date, phone numbers, and currency inputs conform to Brazilian formats on frontend and backend validation.

steps.description: Enter invalid Brazilian date format in scheduling and submit
Display validation error for date format
Enter invalid Brazilian phone number format in client details
Display validation error for phone number
Enter price with invalid currency format during payment
Display validation error for currency

title: Verify PWA offline support and caching functionality
description: Test PWA service worker enables offline usage and caches key resources including scheduling forms and static assets.

steps.description: Access the app online and verify loading of all static and dynamic resources
Simulate going offline in the browser
Navigate through scheduling pages and verify cached content is displayed without errors
Confirm users can complete scheduling operations offline where feasible or receive appropriate offline notifications
Check app install prompt is presented and app is installable

title: Administrative dashboard displays accurate appointment and client data
description: Verify the admin panel's dashboards, scheduling controls, client management, and reporting components display up-to-date and accurate information.

steps.description: Log in as administrator
Access dashboard overview
Dashboard shows current appointment counts with capacity usage
Client management panel lists all active and recurring clients correctly
Generate a report for monthly scheduling and revenue
Report data matches scheduled appointments and payments

title: Prevent scheduling conflicts and verify error handling
description: Ensure system detects and prevents double bookings for the same pet or owner within overlapping appointment times, displaying clear error messages.

steps.description: Schedule appointment for a pet at a given time slot
Attempt to schedule another appointment for the same pet overlapping previous time
Show error preventing conflicting appointment
Attempt to schedule conflicting appointments under the same owner but different pets
Depending on business rule, verify system handles or rejects conflicts appropriately

title: Verify UI responsiveness and modal behavior across mobile and desktop devices
description: Check that the app's UI components, including service selection modals and confirmation dialogs, adapt correctly on various screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Open app on desktop browser and navigate through scheduling process
Verify modals open and close correctly, content is fully visible and interactions work smoothly
Open app on mobile device or emulator
Verify UI components resize appropriately and modals maintain usability and clarity
